sentences.sentence: Frogs will usually breed in any convenient pond.
sentences.translation: 青蛙通常在任何适宜的水塘里繁殖。

sentences.sentence: Thousands of frogs croaked in the reeds by the riverbank.
sentences.translation: 成千上万只青蛙在河岸的芦苇中呱呱地叫。

sentences.sentence: I spent one whole night by a swamp behind the road listening to frogs.
sentences.translation: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。
